mapper.select: SELECT p.project_ttl AS projectTitle, c.company_nm AS companyTitle, a.project_application_created_at_dtm AS appliedDt, r.resume_sq AS resumeSq, r.resume_ttl AS resumeTitle, p.project_candidate_cnt AS applicantCnt, a.read_application_dtm AS readApplicationDt, cc.common_code_nm AS applicantType FROM TBL_RESUME_M r JOIN TBL_PROJECT_APPLICATION_H a ON r.resume_sq = a.resume_sq JOIN TBL_PROJECT_M p ON a.project_sq = p.project_sq JOIN TBL_COMPANY_S c ON p.company_sq = c.company_sq JOIN TBL_COMMON_CODE_C cc ON a.project_application_status_cd = cc.common_code_sq WHERE r.user_sq = #{userSq} ORDER BY a.project_application_created_at_dtm DESC
